snippet.title: Mainframe Defenders Gameplay Trailer 1
snippet.description:
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1184810/Mainframe_Defenders/
Itch.io page: https://shiftycode.itch.io/mainframe-defenders
Visit our site: https://www.mainframe-game.com/?lang=en
Mainframe Defenders is retrofuturistic turn based game with deep tactical gameplay. Free demo is available on our site and steam page!
